googleauthenticator-desc: Allow users to login with Google two factor authentification
google2fa-info: You are required to use 2 factor authentication on this wiki.
google2fa-secret-img: Scan the QR below $1 or use the generated key: $2 to save this application in your GoogleAuthenticator app
google2fa-rescue-codes:
Save the three codes (write them down!) below to use them as rescue keys:
  • $1
  • $2
  • $3
google2fa-login-retry-limit: All given codes were invalid. Try again later.
google2fa-resetted: You've entered a rescue code. Sign in again to create new authentication and rescue codes.
